question: You would like to work overseas, write a letter to an employment agency. Write:- • What job you would like to apply • What companies are you looking for? • Why do you want to work overseas?
text: I am writing this letter with reference to the employment opportunities in Canada. I came across your recruitment agency on the internet.

I have accomplished my ACCA degree from Pakistan and my main areas of strength are accounts and finance. I would like to pursue my career in the accounting field, hence searching for the management accountant role in an organization. I have more than 6 years of experience; worked for 2 major firms and am currently associated with a well reputable organization in UAE.

I want to work for a multinational accounting firm because of my vast knowledge and experience in that field. In addition, I have completed an ERP software course that is being used by major firms around the world which is why I would like to apply to those organizations.

There are several reasons to work in a foreign country. The primary reason is attractive remuneration, management accountants are well paid overseas. In a foreign ,culture I could be able to enhance my skills as well as knowledge. The other reason is my family which is settled in Canada, I would love to relocate and be with them.
Thanks for your consideration and I look forward to hearing from you.
